INST1: You are about to take part in a study in which you will see one of two stimuli: a red or blue circle seen below.  The circle will appear at a different left-right location, but the location it appears in is irrelevant.  When you see the stimulus, respond as quickly as possible: when you see a red circle, respond left; when you see a blue circle, respond right.  Practice now by responding left and right to see which stimulus maps to which response.
PRACTICE: First, we will do some practice trials. Ready to begin?
CONTINUE_MOUSETARGET: Click the Continue button to begin.
CONTINUE_MOUSEBUTTON: Click the middle mouse button to continue.
BREAK_MOUSETARGET: Click the Continue button to resume.
BREAK_MOUSEBUTTON: Click the middle mouse button to continue.
BREAK_KEYBOARD: Press any response key to continue.
DEBRIEF: Thank you for participating.  Press any key to continue.
